mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, FK_UNIT_NO, FK_DELIVERY_NO, FK_CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productContent}, #{productQuantity}, #{unitNo}, #{deliveryNo}, #{categoryNo} )
